title: Destructively Alluring
description: I knew her as a child.Her father was best friends with mine.When he asked, of course I agreed to bring her into my company as an intern.I had no idea what the hell I was getting myself into.Eleven years separate me and that girl.My relationship with her father is too important to risk losing.Tasting her has become an obsession I canâ€™t let go.And making sure no one else has her is going to become my God damned downfall.
author: N. Isabelle Blanco
